title: Police.Squad.TV.Series
description:
This is the original Police Squad TV Series.

First off this is my first Torrent I have created so if it not quite what you are after I appologise.

Anyway I tracked down the AVIs on a P2P site created this DVD and made a copy for a friend who had not managed to find these, so I have put this up in case anyone else would like it.

There are 6 Episodes, there is no menu I tried creating a menued version with ULEAD and with NERO, both crashed this one I managed to create without a menu.

The Picture quality is really good considering these were originally probably VHS rips. It is a video .ixb image file.
